issue.title: [RELEASE] autobrew license in LICENSE.txt is not acceptable
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6679](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6679). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```Java

This project includes code from the autobrew project.

* r/tools/autobrew and dev/tasks/homebrew-formulae/autobrew/apache-arrow.rb
  are based on code from the autobrew project.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2017 - 2019, Jeroen Ooms.
All rights reserved.
Homepage: https://github.com/jeroen/autobrew
```

This code needs to be made available under a Category A license

https://apache.org/legal/resolved.html#category-a

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6679?focusedCommentId=16937274) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Sorry, I thought this was dealt with adequately in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5095 (see discussion). What are the options for resolution? Jeroen adds a license file to https://github.com/jeroen/autobrew, or we remove the file?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6679?focusedCommentId=16937325) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Right, either the file needs an appropriate license applied or it needs to be removed.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6679?focusedCommentId=16937812) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5501
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5501>
